actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to create a standing committee to be known as the Committee on the Environment.

summary.text: Establishes a committee on the Environment in the House of Representatives consisting of twenty-five members. Provides that such committee shall deal with all measures relating to the quality of the physical environment of the United States and its possessions, including: (1) water quality; (2) air quality; (3) weather modification; (4) waste disposal; (5) pesticides and herbicides; and (6) acoustic problems.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to create a standing committee to be known as the Committee on the Environment.
